sentences.sContent: Leaders urged people to turn out in large numbers to repudiate the violence.
sentences.sCn: 领导们力劝人们集体出面来声讨该暴力。

synos.tran: 拒绝；否定；批判；与…断绝关系；拒付

remMethod.val: re + pudi(=put想) + ate → 重新思考 → 拒绝接受

words.tran: 否认，拒绝；抛弃，断绝关系

trans.tranOther: If you repudiate something or someone, you show that you strongly disagree with them and do not want to be connected with them in any way
